summary: Quiet or silence that annoying barking, whining, sniffing, and panting.
descriptionHtml:
Think your dog companion\'s bark vs your headache is OP? Try this little mod! Comes in two flavours:  randomized decreased volume that\'s very quiet (default) or totally silenced. This ONLY effects their idle sounds. 

Installation: Just drop it in your Skyrim folder!

Note: RandomizedQuiet is -15db - (random number between 10-20), and is intended for headphone usage.

Update: Distant barking is now silenced as well in both versions.

Update: Tweaked Randomly Quieter Dog to be a little more audible with max volume (before it was almost completely silent, now it\'s just *mostly* silent)
author: Thrae

files.name: Randomized Quieter Dog with Distant Bark
files.fileName: Randomized Quieter Dog with Distant Bark-1579.zip

files.name: Silent Dog
files.changelogHtml: Distant barking is now silent in both versions. Archived old one.
